channel.title: How would you go about finding a lost relative?
channel.description: i recently went through a break up with my dad and stepmom, i have not heard from my stepbrother and my old cell phone with his # got lost and deactivated :(. how would i go about finding him?

item.title: How would you go about finding a lost relative?
item.dc:creator: @animefreak animefreak
item.description:
@animefreak wrote:

when i mean lost i mean like havent seen in a while, dad erased her cell number…and doesnt remember her family’s adress…

Read full topic
item.source: How would you go about finding a lost relative?

item.title: How would you go about finding a lost relative?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

Have a look at some of the “Find a person” services online…they do charge, but from what I’ve seen, none more than $10. Apparently, there various collections of information needed, but I think some do it by name…

I’ve never used one before, so I have no idea how reliable they would be, but it’s just a thought

Read full topic
item.source: How would you go about finding a lost relative?

item.title: How would you go about finding a lost relative?
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

Hex Key:

I woulds sequence you and your mothers DNA, find some RFLP’s (restriction fragment length polymorphisms) that you have in common, the ones you dont belong to your father. Create a virus that targets that specific region of DNA. Release it, then wait for the news to broadcast a story on a mysterious viral death - that will be the family member you are looking for.

Still fucking genius and sexy. I love you, so much hex key <3.

Read full topic
item.source: How would you go about finding a lost relative?

item.title: How would you go about finding a lost relative?
item.dc:creator: @eggy0095 eggy0095
item.description:
@eggy0095 wrote:

a.the person is not lost
b.you cant just assume the person is in the local area after breakups some people want to get away from the place they got divorced ASAP
c.GTFO my internets

Read full topic

[/quote]
o wow im sure they would put it on the top of there to do list…[/quote]the police have missing people lists that they put up at there station

item.title: How would you go about finding a lost relative?

item.description:
@eggy0095 wrote:

Hex Key:

I woulds sequence you and your mothers DNA, find some RFLP’s (restriction fragment length polymorphisms) that you have in common, the ones you dont belong to your father. Create a virus that targets that specific region of DNA. Release it, then wait for the news to broadcast a story on a mysterious viral death - that will be the family member you are looking for.

right…thats retarded btw u dont have to runaway lol put an add in the paper or just piss off the family memeber hu lives with u till the person gives u a hint (if he/she/micheal jackson knows) oh and go to a tv station and make a story up with the same storyline and they will lap it up (it will get lots of views) and thats bout it…

item.title: How would you go about finding a lost relative?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

lols im kinda in same situation… dad left 9 years ago… i know what area he lives in, i have the suspision that he is dead because he usually always sends christmas and birthday cards, this christmas = no card.

But i’d also like to add that he is a dickhead and i dont actually want to find him lol.
